[SYNTAX]: Severely garbled sentence structure (e.g., "The the from Dynasty...").
[GRAMMAR]: Repetitive words and misplaced phrases (e.g., "his inclined, just the., steps...").

[STRUCTURE]: Abrupt, incomprehensible passage in Chapter II disrupting logical flow.
[CLARITY]: Sudden topic shifts without clear transitions (e.g., tablets to dynasty history).

[SYNTAX]: Occasionally dense, lengthy sentences with multiple clauses.

[STRUCTURE]: Rapid shifts between historical events, theological details, and specific figure names without contextual buildup.
